attributes.action: Get UK Troops out of Afghanistan by 2014
attributes.additional_details: The UK and has had troops in Afghanistan for 10 years now and I think it is high time for them to be removed. They have been fighting, and in some cases dieing, for their country but it has proved nothing for their cause. If the UK government can't realise that the troops in Afghanistan aren't proving anything then I think there isn't alot of hope for our country.

rejection.details: The e-petition that already exists is titled "Pull out of Afghanistan immediately to halt further troop injuries and deaths".
